item.title: 全食超市工会面临与亚马逊签订合同的艰巨任务
item.description: 欢迎阅读《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，斯宾塞-索珀（Spencer Soper）撰文指出，费城一家全食超市（Whole Foods）门店的工会选举不可能很快让工人与亚马逊签订合同。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Spencer Soper writes that the union election at a Whole Foods store in Philadelphia isn’t likely to produce a contract for the workers with Amazon soon.】

item.title: 鲍威尔面临特朗普上台后的首个美联储日考验
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注美联储主席鲍威尔的大日子。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at Fed Chair Powell’s big day. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美联储 2019 年工作报告回顾特朗普关税带来的强劲增长阻力
item.description: 美联储政策制定者们今天结束了为期两天的会议，结束了他们在唐纳德-特朗普总统第二个任期内的首次聚会。【原文：Federal Reserve policy makers finish a two-day meeting today, wrapping up their first gathering under a second term of President Donald Trump that’s already spreading uncertainty through America’s heartland and across the world about US trade policy.】

item.title: 黄金市场推出分类账，追踪从精炼厂到金库的金条
item.description: 黄金市场启动了一个数字数据库，以追踪金块，并将非法来源的贵金属拒之于市场之外。【原文：The gold market has launched a digital database to track bullion and keep precious metal from illicit sources out of the market.】

item.title: ASML 自 2020 年以来的最大涨幅在图表上只是一闪而过
item.description: 在订单量超预期激增的推动下，ASML Holding NV 的股价迎来了自 2020 年 3 月以来最好的一天。然而，从图表上看，这一飞跃并不明显。【原文：Supercharged by an estimate-beating surge in order bookings, shares of ASML Holding NV are having their best day since March 2020. Yet look at a chart dating back that far and the leap is barely noticeable.】

item.title: 瑞士将在关系改善之际终止欧盟股市措施
item.description: 瑞士将把欧盟从其股市保护名单中除名，这是在双方同意达成协议重塑关系后，瑞士于 2019 年实施的一项措施。【原文：Switzerland will remove the European Union from its stock market protection list, rolling back a measure it imposed in 2019 after both sides agreed to a deal to revamp their relations.】

item.title: 高盛策略师称科技股大跌并非熊市信号
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The tech-led selloff in US equities at the start of this week was just a blip, given the positive outlook for the economy, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 科技财报和美联储日可能让交易员忘记 DeepSeek
item.description: 在短暂的科技股飙升之后，投资者们又回到了正常的节目中：美联储和财报将成为焦点。【原文：After the brief tech-stock freakout, it’s back to regular programming for investors: The Fed and earnings are taking center stage.】

item.title: 大石油公司盈利下滑，投资者回报承压
item.description: 全球最大石油公司的股息和回购资金流面临压力，第四季度利润大幅下滑，唐纳德-特朗普总统的回归又增加了不确定性。【原文：The flow of dividends and buybacks from the world’s largest oil companies is under pressure, with fourth-quarter profits plunging and the return of President Donald Trump adding to the uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普竞选经理和前纽约联储主席加入 Coinbase 担任顾问
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 将把曾担任唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统竞选活动联合竞选经理的克里斯-拉西维塔（Chris LaCivita）和前纽约联邦储备银行行长威廉-杜德利（William Dudley）纳入这家美国最大加密货币交易所的全球顾问委员会。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. is adding Chris LaCivita, who was co-campaign manager for Donald Trump’s presidential campaign, and former Federal Reserve Bank of New York President William Dudley to the largest US cryptocurrency exchange’s global advisory council.】

item.title: 特斯拉 6000 亿美元的增长超越了电动汽车增长的主要风险
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）的股价自上次发布财报以来几乎翻了一番；这种情况通常意味着人们对即将发布的财报寄予厚望。但是，特斯拉的汽车销售业务已经成为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）政治地位的配角。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares have nearly doubled in value since the last time the company reported earnings— a set-up that usually spells high expectations for upcoming results. But its car-selling business has become a sideshow to Elon Musk’s political prominence.】

item.title: TikTok 获准向泰国数据项目投资 38 亿美元
item.description: 泰国政府批准社交媒体平台 TikTok 投资 38 亿美元用于数据托管服务，因为这个东南亚国家正努力成为数据中心和云服务的中心。【原文：Social media platform TikTok won Thai government approval to invest $3.8 billion in data hosting services, as the Southeast Asian country pushes to become a hub for data centers and cloud services.】

item.title: 电信公司新任首席执行官面临光纤部门竞标的首次考验
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）和泽戈纳通信公司（Zegona Communications Plc）的西班牙分部将收到对其光纤宽带分部股权的非约束性收购要约，这是自政府更换西班牙电信公司执行董事长以来的第一笔重大交易。【原文：Telefonica SA and Zegona Communications Plc’s Spanish unit are set to receive non-binding offers for a stake in their fiber broadband unit, the first major deal process since the government replaced Telefonica’s executive chairman, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官用人工智能言论化解 DeepSeek 带来的担忧
item.description: 本周早些时候，中国初创公司DeepSeek的低成本聊天机器人扰乱了市场，ASML控股公司（ASML Holding NV）消除了人们对人工智能驱动的芯片制造设备需求的担忧。【原文：ASML Holding NV brushed off concerns about the artificial intelligence-driven demand for its chipmaking machines after Chinese startup DeepSeek’s low-cost chatbot roiled markets earlier in the week.】

item.title: 天气转冷，法国电力期货升至一年来最高点
item.description: 由于天气预报显示寒流即将来临，风力发电量下降，供暖需求增加，欧洲电力价格飙升。【原文：European power prices spiked as weather forecasts showed a cold spell approaching, raising heating demand just as wind generation drops.】

item.title: DeepSeek Whammy 将焦点转向三大科技公司的盈利报告
item.description: 周三下午，美联储将公布利率决定，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将举行例行的会后新闻发布会。【原文：Wednesday afternoon was already expected to be eventful for the stock market, with the Federal Reserve releasing its decision on interest rates and Chair Jerome Powell holding his regular post-meeting press conference.】

item.title: DeepSeek 对能源效率的承诺令电力股黯然失色
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 引发的大跌并不仅限于英伟达公司等科技股。对人工智能建设起关键作用的能源公司股票也受到打击，让华尔街一些人怀疑它们的估值是否过高。【原文：The selloff caused by Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek wasn’t just limited to technology stocks like Nvidia Corp. Shares in energy companies key to the AI buildout were hammered too, leaving some on Wall Street wondering if their valuations are too high.】

item.title: 欧洲准备禁止俄罗斯进口铝，铝价攀升
item.description: 由于欧盟准备提出逐步禁止从俄罗斯进口铝金属的建议，伦敦铝市上涨。【原文：Aluminum rose in London as the European Union readied a proposal to gradually ban imports of the metal from Russia.】

item.title: 联邦银行坎宁安押注长债锁定美国收益率
item.description: 联邦爱马仕公司（Federated Hermes Inc.【原文：Federated Hermes Inc. is pushing out maturities in its money market funds close to the maximum limit — a bet that contrarian calls for US interest-rate hikes are off the mark and there’s more easing to come.】

item.title: 被定罪的对冲基金交易员在税务丑闻案中获减刑
item.description: 一名对冲基金交易员因在一起大规模丑闻中进行虚假的 Cum-Ex 交易而被判定犯有欺诈罪，该丑闻导致丹麦国库损失共计 127 亿克朗（18 亿美元），丹麦上诉法院对其减刑。【原文：A hedge fund trader convicted of fraud over sham Cum-Ex trades in a massive scandal that cost Denmark’s treasury a total of 12.7 billion kroner ($1.8 billion) had his prison sentence reduced by a Danish appeals court.】

item.title: 财务总监称欧盟即将就交易规则延迟做出决定
item.description: 欧盟财政部长表示，欧盟不久将宣布其实施《巴塞尔协议三》法规中管理银行交易活动部分的计划，因为要求欧洲效仿其他地方延迟实施的压力越来越大。【原文：The European Union will shortly announce its plans for implementing the part of the Basel III regulations that governs banks’ trading activities, according to its finance chief, amid growing pressure for Europe to follow delays elsewhere.】

item.title: 阿达尼电力公司获董事会批准通过出售股票筹资 5.78 亿美元
item.description: 阿达尼电力有限公司（Adani Power Ltd.）周三表示，该公司计划通过向合格机构买家出售股票筹集多达 500 亿卢比（约合 5.78 亿美元）的资金，此举旨在加强其资本支出计划。【原文：Adani Power Ltd. plans to raise as much as 50 billion rupees ($578 million) by selling shares to qualified institutional buyers, the company said Wednesday, in a move aimed at bolstering its capital spending plans.】

item.title: 加里波洛全面掌权后，巴西央行将延长加息时间
item.description: 加布里埃尔-加里波洛（Gabriel Galipolo）将于本周三主持他作为巴西央行行长的首次利率决策，他的任务明确而众所周知：他现在主持的董事会将连续第二次将基准利率上调整整一个百分点。【原文：Gabriel Galipolo will chair his first interest rate decision as Brazil’s central bank governor on Wednesday with a clear, well-known mission: the board he now presides will raise the benchmark interest rate by a full percentage point for the second straight meeting.】

item.title: 乌克兰称一周内袭击了俄罗斯第二家大型炼油厂
item.description: 乌克兰一夜之间在俄罗斯九个地区发动了规模最大的一次无人机袭击，一周内袭击了第二家大型炼油厂。【原文：Ukraine launched one of the largest drone attacks across nine Russian regions overnight, hitting the second major oil refinery in a week.】

item.title: SSAB 首席执行官预计欧洲钢铁需求将持续低迷
item.description: 瑞典最大的钢铁制造商新任总裁表示，受建筑业和汽车业疲软的影响，欧洲钢铁消费的低迷不会很快结束。【原文：The slump in European steel consumption, driven by the weak construction and automotive industries, isn’t about to end anytime soon, according to the new chief of Sweden’s biggest steelmaker.】

item.title: 阿克苏诺贝尔因警告 2025 年需求不会反弹而下跌
item.description: 阿克苏诺贝尔公司（Akzo Nobel NV）股价在阿姆斯特丹早盘交易中下滑，此前这家欧洲最大的涂料生产商淡化了今年需求将反弹的预期。【原文：Akzo Nobel NV shares slumped in early Amsterdam trading after Europe’s largest paintmaker played down expectations that demand would bounce back this year.】

item.title: JLL 称全球企业在印度的写字楼租赁创历史新高
item.description: 根据房地产服务公司仲量联行（Jones Lang LaSalle）的数据，去年在印度主要城市租赁的 7720 万平方英尺办公空间中，全球能力中心（Global Capability Centers）（处理母公司业务流程的离岸单位）占了三分之一以上，创下了 "历史新高"。【原文：Global Capability Centers — offshore units that handle the parent’s business processes — accounted for over a third of the “record-breaking” 77.2 million square feet of office space leased in India’s key cities last year, according to property services firm Jones Lang LaSalle.】

item.title: 瑞典央行下调瑞典利率，释放暂时结束宽松政策的信号
item.description: 瑞典央行将借贷成本降低了四分之一个百分点，并表示其宽松政策可能暂时告一段落，因为官员们正在评估其迄今为止所采取的行动的影响。【原文：Sweden’s central bank lowered borrowing costs by a quarter point and signaled its easing campaign may be finished for now as officials assess the impact of their actions so far.】

item.title: 欧盟最环保基金迎来牛市中最大一次资金外流
item.description: 晨星公司（Morningstar Inc）的最新报告显示，由于投资者为了寻求更好的回报而放弃了这一策略，符合欧盟最严格的环境、社会和公司治理标准的基金在上个季度遭遇了创纪录的资金外流。【原文：Funds complying with the European Union’s strictest ESG standards suffered record outflows last quarter, as investors turned away from the strategy in search of better returns, according to a fresh report by Morningstar Inc.】

item.title: 随着印度对迪奥、资生堂等品牌的消费增加，Nykaa 预计将实现强劲增长
item.description: 经营 Nykaa 的印度顶级美容零售商 FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd. 预计，随着迪奥、资生堂和汤姆-福特等全球品牌甚至在较小的城市也能吸引到买家，富裕程度的提高将推动其在新兴市场的快速增长。【原文：India’s top beauty retailer FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd., which operates Nykaa, expects rising affluence to fuel its fast-paced growth in a nascent market as global brands from Dior to Shiseido and Tom Ford lure buyers even in the smaller cities.】
